justification: Misreads Team B’s needs: they already have three Tier 1 QBs (including dual-threats), so a Tier 4 QB adds little. Offers a doubtful WR to an injury-averse manager. Asks for Devon Lewis, who fits B’s young, healthy, ascending preference, making B less likely to part with him. Rationale is brief and ignores B’s current roster strengths and injury stance, though the trade is structurally feasible.
